description.narrative: The objective of the project is to improve urban infrastructure and urban services management in the two cities Thimphu and Phuentsholing and Dagana Town, which will contribute to increasing the growth potential in these areas. The objective will be achieved by (i) improving urban infrastructure planning; (ii) constructing urban roads, drainage and other public infrastructure; (iii) increasing water treatment, supply, and sanitation coverage; (iv) enhancing community awareness on proper hygiene; and (v) providing capacity building trainings in urban facility management to staff of project cities and towns, and the Executing Agency (EA), Department of Urban Development and Engineering Services (DUDES) at Ministry of Works and Human Settlement (MoWHS)

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Works and Human Settlement (MoWHS)

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Sewerage coverage increases to 50% in Dagana by 2012.
